TopicTitle: [WIP] [1.0.5] (Dev Paused) QuizTech Aero Pack v1.2.9.x | Updated: 8/9/15 |

Articles.Content:
I have an issue in where I cant unlock the vtol engines and command pods which only leaves me with the rcs thruster and the drone part. I also tried it on sandbox and it didnt show up in the parts list

Update: I am so stupid ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif) I added the zip file.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-05T23:52:38Z" title="05/05/2015 11:52  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 5, 2015</time> by KazeNinja**

There are attachment node issues. Many, many issues with attachment nodes.

EDIT: Also, the K10 cockpit does not have an IVA.

> 
> There are attachment node issues. Many, many issues with attachment nodes.

The K-10 does not have an IVA yet, but I will make one eventually when I find some time. 

You're still having attachment node issues? Strange, I went through them all and they should be fixed..

> 
> The K-10 does not have an IVA yet, but I will make one eventually when I find some time. 
> You're still having attachment node issues? Strange, I went through them all and they should be fixed..

I re-installed it, and the attachment node issues vanished. However, the twin turbofan engine animation does not seem to work.

EDIT: Found a part that has the attachment node bug. The Mk2 to 1.25m adapter with intakes part will not let other parts connect to the back-side node.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-06T04:30:48Z" title="05/06/2015 04:30  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 6, 2015</time> by Mekan1k**

> 
> However, the twin turbofan engine animation does not seem to work.

Maybe BDAnimationModules needs an update...?

This mod continues to get better and better.

Thanks for all of your work and great ideas..

Cheers.

> 
> I re-installed it, and the attachment node issues vanished. However, the twin turbofan engine animation does not seem to work.
> EDIT: Found a part that has the attachment node bug. The Mk2 to 1.25m adapter with intakes part will not let other parts connect to the back-side node.

Ahh, yes it seems that that one slipped through, just fixed it though! blowfish is correct in that BDAnimationModules does need an update. The twin engines were giving a nullexception error and refused to function with the module present, so I commented it out for now. I forgot to add that to the change log lol.

This mod looks, and im sure it is, really cool, however, i can only get 2 items to work, the mk2 robnose and the twin thruster. can someone give me advice on it, ive typed it in on every search engine, please help!![;.;](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cry.gif)

I was about to get all grumbly about how the Thunderbolt IVA was messed up, and that it looked like it was referencing non-existent B9 RPM displays, and then I remembered I had only the B9 struts and small lights installed, and thus the fault was entirely mine. So... great to see this working nicely in 1.0 ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

BDAnimationModules has been updated. Grab it from either adjustable landing gear or bdynamics.

Edit: Or from [github](https://github.com/BahamutoD/BDAnimationModules/releases/tag/v0.6.0).

No worries, just askin' ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
I cant seem to switch the F-35 engine into VTOL mode it acts like a normal jet and their is no button to toggle vtol

> 
> I cant seem to switch the F-35 engine into VTOL mode it acts like a normal jet and their is no button to toggle vtol

Make sure that you have the latest version of firespitter installed. There is one packaged in the main file.

Working on a new wing/engine combo ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Will be configured to work on planets without oxygen as well, like Duna for example.

Would you guys prefer the fan to be just open to the air when deactivated, or to have an animation that opens/closes on activation/deactivation?

Edit: Delta Wing is for scale.

![9myM0FUh.png](http://i.imgur.com/9myM0FUh.png)

![OQPJz9vh.png](http://i.imgur.com/OQPJz9vh.png)
It would be cool if shutters closed or the blades folded flat when deactivated, but I won't refuse to use them if that doesn't happen.

Got the parts in the game, and I'm quite happy with them ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Still need a bunch of tweaking until they are complete to my liking, but here's an example craft I put together using them:

How do I close the cyclone vtol engine flap thingys?

Im sure I messed up somewhere as Im not an expert at modding games, but Im having an issue where I cannot get into IVA with the K10 cockpit at all. In fact, there is no window in the lower right corner where you would normally see the kebal, but he IS in there because I can EVA... All the other cockpits seem to have working IVAs tho. Only the K10 doesn't and I cannot figure it out...

The readme says the files I need are in the extras folder, but nothing I do with that helps...

Im hoping I dont need B9 aerospace...I haven't gotten it yet because it hasn't been updated for 1.0.2 yet....is there no way to make it work?
